data.title: State Water Board Approves Emergency Curtailment Regulation for Scott and Shasta Rivers
data.excerpt: With climate change-induced drought causing critical low flows in the Scott and Shasta Rivers and threatening the survival of multiple fish species, the State Water Resources Control Board today approved an emergency curtailment regulation.
data.author: Chach Sikes
